name: Prayer Tent
description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

variations.name: Prayer Tent
variations.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.
